author: Fextralife
description:
Divinity Original Sin 2 Builds - TOP 5 BUILDS (BEGINNER FRIENDLY)
In this Fextralife video, I'm going to be showing you 5 OP builds that you can play in the game. These don't necessarily all work together, but most of them do. Divinity Original Sin 2 is popping right now. People are playing it with the announcement of the new Divinity game. 

Wiki:
http://divinityoriginalsin2.wiki.fextralife.com/Divinity+Original+Sin+2+Wiki

0:00 Divinity Original Sin 2 Best Builds
0:34 Eternal Warrior Build
3:27 Ranger build
5:54 Tidalist build
7:59 Tectonic Sage build
9:29 Juggernaut build
